thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Kayla

author: Kayla
title: Kayla
text: I've made several orders from thriftbooks over the last few years, since I discovered them. Every book I've received has been in good or like new condition, as promised, and many are former library books. I can get myself 4 or 5 new books I've been eyeing for a while as a present to myself for the holidays, or my birthday, which is a lovely treat :) The website is always easy and the books arrive quickly!
